title: Veggies on Fire
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Beer/Wine
description: Opened in April 2013, this is a vegan food restaurant that also provides raw food and fresh salads. All dishes are made from scratch with organic ingredients including seitan, bread, desserts. Offers hearty meals like vegan schnitzel, chipotle burger, and veggie cutlets with roasted potatoes; plus weekly changing soups. Cozy interior with large windows. Accessible by Randstadrail 3 from central station (stop at Valkenbosplein), or by tram 12 from Hollands Spoor station (stop at Weimarstraat).
